languages.text: "Владайм — скользкий, но очень осмотрительный малый. Говорит обычно по делу, на нервы не действует. Еще он не дурак — дураки до таких высот в Касбаллике не поднимаются. Держите все это в голове. Вы — Вольный Торговец, вы выше его по статусу и обладаете немалыми силами. Но история знает случаи, когда бароны Касбаллики схлестывались с Вольным Торговцами и выходили победителями. Имейте это в виду и не теряйте бдительности".

traits.locale_text: "Владайм — скользкий, но очень осмотрительный малый. Говорит обычно по делу, на нервы не действует. Еще он не дурак — дураки до таких высот в Касбаллике не поднимаются. Держите все это в голове. Вы — Вольный Торговец, вы выше его по статусу и обладаете немалыми силами. Но история знает случаи, когда бароны Касбаллики схлестывались с Вольным Торговцами и выходили победителями. Имейте это в виду и не теряйте бдительности".

languages.text: "Vladaym is a slippery yet very cautious fellow. He does not usually beat around the bush and does not play mind games. Perhaps more importantly, he is no fool — fools do not rise this high in the Kasballican hierarchy. Keep all this in mind. You are a Rogue Trader, you stand above him in status and wield considerable power. Having said that, history has seen cases where the Kasballican barons crossed swords with Rogue Traders and emerged victorious. Do not forget that, and remain vigilant."

traits.locale_text: "Vladaym is a slippery yet very cautious fellow. He usually doest not beat about the bush and does not seek to annoy you. Perhaps more importantly, he is no fool — fools do not rise this high in the Kasballica hierarchy. Keep all this in mind. You are a Rogue Trader, you stand above him in status and wield considerable power. Having said that, history knows cases when Kasballica barons crossed swords with Rogue Traders and came out victorious. Do not forget this and remain vigilant."

languages.text: «Vladaym es un tipo escurridizo y cauteloso. No suele andarse con rodeos ni jugar a las adivinanzas, pero lo más importante a tener en cuenta es que no es tonto. Para llegar tan alto en la jerarquía Kasballica hace falta usar la cabeza. Téngalo en cuenta. Siendo Comerciante Independiente, está muy por encima de él en estatus y dispone de poder considerable, pero, dicho esto, se han visto situaciones en las que los barones de Kasballica han luchado contra Comerciantes Independientes y se han hecho con la victoria. Por eso no debe bajar la guardia».
languages.original_text: "Vladaym is a slippery yet very cautious fellow. He does not usually beat around the bush and does not play mind games. Perhaps more importantly, he is no fool — fools do not rise this high in the Kasballican hierarchy. Keep all this in mind. You are a Rogue Trader, you stand above him in status and wield considerable power. Having said that, history has seen cases where the Kasballican barons crossed swords with Rogue Traders and emerged victorious. Do not forget that, and remain vigilant."

Para llegar tan alto en la jerarquía Kasballica hace falta usar la cabeza. Téngalo en cuenta. Siendo Comerciante Independiente, está muy por encima de él en estatus y dispone de poder considerable, pero, dicho esto, se han visto situaciones en las que los barones de Kasballica han luchado contra Comerciantes Independientes y se han hecho con la victoria. Por eso no debe bajar la guardia».

languages.text: “弗拉迪姆是个既狡猾、又谨慎的家伙。他不喜欢拐弯抹角，也不喜欢玩弄心计，但或许更重要的是，他并不是什么蠢人，因为蠢人没法在卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团爬到这样的位置，请务必牢记这几点。您是行商浪人，拥有着极为强大的权力，地位也在他之上。话虽如此，历史上也曾发生过卡斯巴利卡的男爵战胜行商浪人的情况。不要忘记这一点，要始终保持警惕。”
languages.original_text: "Vladaym is a slippery yet very cautious fellow. He does not usually beat around the bush and does not play mind games. Perhaps more importantly, he is no fool — fools do not rise this high in the Kasballican hierarchy. Keep all this in mind. You are a Rogue Trader, you stand above him in status and wield considerable power. Having said that, history has seen cases where the Kasballican barons crossed swords with Rogue Traders and emerged victorious. Do not forget that, and remain vigilant."

traits.locale_text: “弗拉迪姆是个既狡猾、又谨慎的家伙。他不喜欢拐弯抹角，也不喜欢玩弄心计，但或许更重要的是，他并不是什么蠢人，因为蠢人没法在卡斯巴利卡犯罪团伙爬到这样的位置，请务必牢记这几点。您是行商浪人，拥有着极为强大的权力，地位也在他之上。话虽如此，历史上也曾发生过卡斯巴利卡的男爵战胜行商浪人的情况。不要忘记这一点，要始终保持警惕。”

languages.text: 「ヴラダイムは、捉え所がなくて非常に用心深い男です。普段から遠回しに言うことや、心理戦を仕掛けることはありません。こう言ったほうがいいですね、バカな男ではないのですーー愚か者はカスバリカの階級社会でトップに立てません。全て心に留めておいてください。あなたは自由開拓者で立場はあの男よりも上、かなりの権力を持ちます。そうは言っても、過去にはカスバリカ男爵が自由開拓者と剣を交えて勝利したという歴史もある。それを忘れなく。引き続き警戒してください」
languages.original_text: "Vladaym is a slippery yet very cautious fellow. He does not usually beat around the bush and does not play mind games. Perhaps more importantly, he is no fool — fools do not rise this high in the Kasballican hierarchy. Keep all this in mind. You are a Rogue Trader, you stand above him in status and wield considerable power. Having said that, history has seen cases where the Kasballican barons crossed swords with Rogue Traders and emerged victorious. Do not forget that, and remain vigilant."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴラダイムは、捉え所がなくて非常に用心深い男です。普段から遠回しに言うことや、心理戦を仕掛けることはありません。こう言ったほうがいいですね、バカな男ではないのですーー愚か者はカスバリカの階級社会でトップに立てません。全て心に留めておいてください。あなたは自由開拓者で立場はあの男よりも上、かなりの権力を持ちます。そうは言っても、過去にはカスバリカ男爵が自由開拓者と剣を交えて勝利したという歴史もある。それを忘れなく。引き続き警戒してください」

languages.text: "Vladaym ist ein aalglatter, aber auch sehr vorsichtiger Geselle. Er kommt meistens direkt zur Sache und hält nichts von Psychospielchen. Noch wichtiger ist, dass er nicht dumm ist – Dummköpfe kommen in der Kasballica-Hierarchie nicht so weit. Das alles solltet Ihr immer im Kopf behalten. Ihr seid {mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin}, Ihr steht im Status über ihm und verfügt über beträchtliche Macht. Andererseits gab es durchaus schon Fälle, bei denen die Kasballica-Barone mit Freihändlern die Klingen gekreuzt haben und als Sieger hervorgegangen sind. Vergesst das nicht und bleibt wachsam."
languages.original_text: "Vladaym is a slippery yet very cautious fellow. He does not usually beat around the bush and does not play mind games. Perhaps more importantly, he is no fool — fools do not rise this high in the Kasballican hierarchy. Keep all this in mind. You are a Rogue Trader, you stand above him in status and wield considerable power. Having said that, history has seen cases where the Kasballican barons crossed swords with Rogue Traders and emerged victorious. Do not forget that, and remain vigilant."

languages.text: « Vladaym est un homme fuyant et extrêmement prudent à la fois. Il n'est pas du genre à tourner autour du pot ni à jouer au plus malin, et surtout, il est loin d'être bête. Un imbécile n'aurait jamais gravi autant d'échelons dans la hiérarchie de la Kasballica. Gardez tout cela à l'esprit. En tant que {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, vous jouissez d'un statut plus élevé et disposez d'un pouvoir considérable. Cela dit, il est arrivé que des barons de la Kasballica croisent le fer avec des libres-marchands et en ressortent vainqueurs. Ne l'oubliez pas et restez {mf|vigilant|vigilante}. »
languages.original_text: "Vladaym is a slippery yet very cautious fellow. He does not usually beat around the bush and does not play mind games. Perhaps more importantly, he is no fool — fools do not rise this high in the Kasballican hierarchy. Keep all this in mind. You are a Rogue Trader, you stand above him in status and wield considerable power. Having said that, history has seen cases where the Kasballican barons crossed swords with Rogue Traders and emerged victorious. Do not forget that, and remain vigilant."

traits.locale_text: « Vladaym est un homme fuyant et extrêmement prudent à la fois. Il n'est pas du genre à tourner autour du pot ni à jouer au plus malin, et surtout, il est loin d'être bête. Un imbécile n'aurait jamais gravi autant d'échelons dans la hiérarchie de la Kasballica. Gardez tout cela à l'esprit. En tant que {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, vous jouissez d'un statut plus élevé et disposez d'un pouvoir considérable. Cela dit, il est arrivé que des barons de la Kasballica croisent le fer avec des libres-marchands et en ressortent vainqueurs. Ne l'oubliez pas et restez {mf|vigilant|vigilante}. »

languages.text: "Vladaym, dalavereci ama bir o kadar da tedbirli bir adamdır. Genelde lafı dolandırmaz, akıl oyunları oynamaz. En önemlisi de aklı zehir gibi çalışır. Zira aptallar Kasballica hiyerarşisinde fazla yükselemezler. Bunları aklınızda tutun. Siz Hür Tacir'siniz, statü olarak ondan yukarıdasınız ve hatırı sayılır bir güce sahipsiniz. Gelgelelim geçmişte Kasballica baronlarının Hür Tacirlerle çatıştığı ve galip geldiği görülmüştür. Bunu unutmayın, tetikte olun."
languages.original_text: "Vladaym is a slippery yet very cautious fellow. He does not usually beat around the bush and does not play mind games. Perhaps more importantly, he is no fool — fools do not rise this high in the Kasballican hierarchy. Keep all this in mind. You are a Rogue Trader, you stand above him in status and wield considerable power. Having said that, history has seen cases where the Kasballican barons crossed swords with Rogue Traders and emerged victorious. Do not forget that, and remain vigilant."

traits.locale_text: "Vladaym dalavereci ama aynı zamanda çok dikkatli bir dostumuzdur. Genelde lafı dolandırmaz ve akıl oyunları oynamaz. Daha da önemlisi: Bir aptal değildir, aptallar Kasballica hiyerarşisinde fazla yükselemezler. Bunları aklınızda tutun. Siz bir Hür Tacir'siniz, statü olarak ondan yukarıdasınız ve elinizde hatırı sayılır bir güç tutuyorsunuz. Yine de tarih boyunca Kasballica baronlarının Hür Tacirlerle çatışmalara girdiği ve galip geldiği görülmüştür. Bunu unutmayın ve tetikte olun."
